userId.bio: I am a passionate Front-End Developer for Web and Mobile. I have more than two years of real industrial experiences in modern web development technologies like JavaScript, HTML, CSS and their popular frameworks like AngularJS, ReactJS, React-Native, Bootstrap, AngularJS Material, ReactJS Material UI, NativeBase, SASS, SCSS and LESS. Webpack and Git have been my best friend during my daily work. I have enough hands on experiences to work on a project independently or as part of team.

eduId.summary: During this four years of my academic life I completed many different subjects. It includes science courses like Math, Chemistry and Physics, programming language courses like JavaScript, C++, Java, network related courses like Cisco networking, system related courses like Operating system, C language, language courses like Professional English Writing, Professional English Speaking, basic and intermediate level Finnish , and some other courses which are related to software business, project management and leadership.
